document.masterDocTitle: Checklist of Braconinae species of Turkey (Hymenoptera: Braconidae)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Checklist of Braconinae species of Turkey (Hymenoptera: Braconidae)

subSubSection.paragraph:
B. rotundulus Szépligeti, 1904
;
B. rytrensis Niezabitowski, 1910
.

Distribution in Turkey :
Amanos Mountains ( Fahringer, 1922 ); Adana , Antalya , Icel, Isparta Kahramanmaras ( Beyarslan, 1986a ); Edirne , Kirklareli ( Beyarslan, 1987a ); Turkey ( van Achterberg, 1993 ); Adana , Adapazari, Antalya , Balikesir , Bursa , Canakkale , Edirne , Isparta , Istanbul , Izmit , Kahramanmaras , Sanliurfa , Tekirdag , Van ( Beyarslan, 1999 ); Ankara ( Guler & Cagatay, 2001 ); Imbros, Tenedos ( Beyarslan et al. 2002b ); Kastamonu , Bartin , Bolu , Cankiri , Duzce , Karabuk , Sinop ( Beyarslan et al. 2005 ); Tekirdag ( Beyarslan et al. 2006a ); Amasya , Ordu , Samsun , Tokat ( Beyarslan et al. 2008a ); Erzurum ( Guclu & Ozbek, 2011 ); Aksaray , Amasya , Ankara , Antalya , Artvin , Bartin , Bayburt , Bilecik , Burdur , Cankiri , Denizli , Edirne , Elazig , Erzincan , Eskisehir , Giresun , Gumushane , Kayseri , Kirikkale , Kirklareli , Konya , Malatya , Nevsehir , Rize , Samsun , Sivas , Tekirdag , Tokat , Trabzon , Tunceli , Yozgat , Zonguldak ( Beyarslan & Cetin Erdogan, 2012 ); Şanlıurfa (Beyaraslan et al. 2014).
